links.*: Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien

wikitext.*:
[[File:Mr Polet 1 January 1956.jpg|thumb]] On [[1 January]] [[1956]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to Mr Polet'''. *'''Description:''' Handwritten and signed by Tolkien on his Sandfield Road letter paper. 5x7"/13x17 cm.[http://www.tolkienshop.com/contents/en-uk/d228.html?mid=anthe_363#p5870 Tolkienshop.com] as of June 23, 2010 == Excerpt == {{blockquote|Dear Mr Polet,

I cannot resist the temptation to disobey your kind command not to answer, and write to thank you for your letter of 22 December.

I am most grateful for your expression of pleasure; and I hope that you will continue to enjoy Vols. ii and iii.

Yours sincerely

J.R.R. Tolkien}} {{references}} [[Category:Letters|Polet, Mr]]
